thread.title: Michael Adams a satisfied Customer
thread.title_full: Consumers Plumbing reviewed by Michael Adams a satisfied Customer

author: Michael Adams a satisfied Customer
title: Michael Adams a satisfied Customer
text: I got my pump in the time frame expected. The pump was sold at a nice price, with free shipping. Overall the transaction went without issue and as planned. I would buy from this seller again.
